original_text: And if what was transitory came with glory, how much greater is the glory of that which lasts!
korean_text: 없어질 것도 영광으로 말미암았은즉 길이 있을 것은 더욱 영광 가운데 있느니라

sentences.original_text: And if what was transitory came with glory
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 만약 무가치한 것이 영광과 함께 왔다면

sentences.original_text: how much greater is the glory
